mapper.insert: insert into infotosubject (infotosubjectid, fraction, classhour, classhourweek, mode,infoid,subjectid,semester) values (#{infotosubjectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fraction,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{classhour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classhourweek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{subjectid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{semester,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM infotosubject WHERE infoid=#{arg0} AND subjectid = #{arg1}
mapper.select: select infotosubject.subjectid from infotosubject where infoid = #{arg0} AND semester = #{arg1}
select * from infotosubject where infoid = #{arg0} AND subjectid = #{arg1}
